content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains and I believe that I can offer you a fair rental price. May I ask what you are looking for in terms of monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. Can you give me your proposal?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, Hassan. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Mannheim, I believe that a fair rental price would be around €700 per month. However, I am open to negotiating and finding a mutually agreeable price. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of €700 per month.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Excellent, Hassan. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement. As the landlord, I will ensure that the apartment is in good condition and that all necessary utilities are included in the rental price. I look forward to welcoming you as my tenant and to working with you in the future.
name: Heinrich Heine
